title: Maldives resort makes THE LIST for travel and tourism excellence
text:
Maldives resort makes THE LIST for travel and tourism excellence Adv: 
Jul 09, 2015 Adv: 
THE LIST, eTurboNews’ (eTN) award for travel and tourism excellence is growing. Today eTN announced Baros Maldives resort was added to THE LIST. 
So how does one make it on THE LIST? Anyone can nominate a hotel, destination, attraction, airline, person, cruise, or restaurant based on a best moment or experience. THE LIST is not about rating how “luxurious” something is. It is more about how much something is appreciated or different. 
The Baros Maldives resort is definitely both luxurious and unique. Recently eTN reported about the Maldives most romantic resort – Baros. 
eTN Publisher Juergen T. Steinmetz experienced the Baros Signature Massage for himself and said: "Having traveled all over the world and having had massage treatments in some of the most renowned and luxurious spas in the world, I have to say that the Baros massage was special and unique. 
The Baros Signature Massage is a unique marriage of four different massage techniques - Swedish, Thai, Pressure Point, and Hot Stone. The treatment adapts the finer points to the guest’s specific needs. The result? A blissfully rejuvenating experience. 
Steinmetz continued, “We are pleased to add Baros resort and spa in the Maldives islands to THE LIST.” 
Mr. Ahmed Shuhan, a Maldivian, born and brought up on an island in the southern Maldivian atoll of Addu is the Baros Resort Manager, and he said: “We are delighted to be part of THE LIST by eTN. Our highest aim is to deliver individual and sincere service to our guests and to be the first choice for couples who are looking for a romantic and peaceful getaway. This award is a great achievement and proof that our efforts are appreciated and successful.” 
For more information on THE LIST, go to www.honesttravelawards.com
